function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased vulnerability to global shocks due to international specialisation in gvcs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of shocks through global value chains gvcs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions in gvcs due to re-localisation policy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks and instability associated with international fragmentation of production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cultural differences in perceiving and understanding recommendations for the built environment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic constraints impacting sustainable social development and vector-free built environment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exchange of information in public health forums may lead to the spread of misinformation or unverified strategies for malaria control.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and standardization among institutions and organizations may lead to fragmented and inconsistent approaches to malaria control.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to the knowledge management platform may hinder the dissemination of critical information and best practices for malaria control.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research and data on improving building health impacts and public awareness campaigns","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic constraints associated with generating public awareness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of relevant information integration into decision-making processes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific actions for health in the nua","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data gap at the local level","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cooperation between stakeholders","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate housing, poor sanitation, and waste management in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air quality failing who guidelines in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific actions in the nua regarding health and the built environment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demolition waste in landfills creating favorable breeding conditions for risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to increased impact on health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Buildings constructed with traditional risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor iaq can increase the risk of respiratory diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced air exchanges due to modified building openings can lead to increased outdoor time and higher risk of mosquito exposure in malarious areas.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of close synergies rates due to building modifications","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of synergy in building envelop modifications","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Leakage from temporary water supply points or improperly drained storm water","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Malaria-causing mosquitoes access buildings through inlets and outlets, designed for air exchange","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in global wind patterns and increased rainfall propagate the spread of malaria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in global wind patterns and increased rainfall can propagate the spread of malaria
